title: Profile Settings
description: Manage your personal information and account security
personalInfoDescription: Update your account details and profile picture
profilePictureDescription: Enter a URL to your profile picture
usernameDescription: Your display name visible to other users
emailDescription: Your email address for notifications and login
changePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure
newPasswordDescription: Password must be at least 6 characters, recommend using combination of letters, numbers, and special characters
passwordTip1: Use at least 6 characters (longer is better)
passwordTip2: Include a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters
passwordTip3: Add numbers and special characters (e.g., @#$%, etc.)
passwordTip4: Avoid common words or personal information
passwordTip5: Don't reuse passwords from other accounts
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
